detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Lotto.fallback() (repairResNew/SmartBugN/etherpot_lottoU1.sol#85-104):
	External calls:
	- ! msg.sender.send(msg.value - value) (repairResNew/SmartBugN/etherpot_lottoU1.sol#92)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount += ticketsCount (repairResNew/SmartBugN/etherpot_lottoU1.sol#96)
	- buyersLength = rounds[roundIndex].buyers.length ++ (repairResNew/SmartBugN/etherpot_lottoU1.sol#98)
	- rounds[roundIndex].buyers[buyersLength] = msg.sender (repairResNew/SmartBugN/etherpot_lottoU1.sol#99)
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCountByBuyer[msg.sender] += ticketsCount (repairResNew/SmartBugN/etherpot_lottoU1.sol#101)
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount += ticketsCount (repairResNew/SmartBugN/etherpot_lottoU1.sol#102)
	- rounds[roundIndex].pot += value (repairResNew/SmartBugN/etherpot_lottoU1.sol#103)
